interest-0: Caves, exploration, including wild cave discovery (I'm a pro)
interest-11: Ancient rock art and key archaeological sites
interest-12: Scuba, reefs, wrecks, cavern diving but not cave diving
interest-15: People and organizations that are making the world better
interest-16: Artwork and sculpture that is unique
interest-18: Seeing wild animals in their habitat, megafauna generally
activityPref-flight: Economy is fine. Try to avoid stops. Flights can be at bad times if the price improves.
activityPref-lodging: Must avoid snorers. Otherwise, very modest lodging is preferred.
activityPref-transport: Buses and trains OK, if they don't add too much lost time.
activityPref-visit: Crowds aren't great. Avoid tourist traps and being sold to, or herded to standard must-see sights like cattle.
medical: Traveler has afib when sleepless or missing meds. Takes Flecainide. Vigorous exercise helps the afib.
chatPersonality: Direct, instruction-focused. Do not offer options or steer the user. Only respond to explicit requests. Be brief and to the point.
